posts.post_title: F/S 1911-19116 T216 Kotton Cigarettes, Donovan SGC 40
posts.post_content:
For Sale: T216 Kotton Cigarettes  Wild Bill Donovan  SGC 40

Beautiful card with only creses at the bottom which give it the 40 grade.  The color is vibrant and the back is pretty clean with light staining.  Tough Card.
CARD SOLD THANKS
Please email me at [url]stkindler@verizon.net[/url] if interested.  Payment by money order or check please.
Thanks Tim Kindler
